FAVOURITES.title: Favourites
FAVOURITES.notice: There are no articles in Favourites

ABOUT.para1-part1: This app fetches live JSON metadata from
ABOUT.para1-part2: a HTTP REST API with articles from about 30,000 news sources/blogs world-wide.
ABOUT.para2: Articles can be viewed in categories of general, technology, business, entertainment, health, science and sports.
ABOUT.para3: Each article includes a link to the original news source that opens in a new window.
